item.title: Case 409: Help please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if(objectID == ####) { //Altar ID if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { //If your prayer is full.. sendMessage("You already have full Prayer points."); // Send this message } else { // If your prayer is not full.. setAnimation(645); //Do this animation playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); //Prayer is recharged sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687); // Show full prayer points in stats sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + "", 4013); sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); sendMessage("You recharge your Prayer points."); //Sends message } }
